docs.lead_paragraph: Less than a week before the opening of the Olympics, IOC leaders will meet in Rio de Janeiro this weekend to review the final preparations for the games and deal with the fallout from the doping scandal that has led to the exclusion of more than 100 Russian athletes.

docs.abstract: Russian athletes who were barred from participating in 2016 Olympics because of doping compete among themselves in what is dubbed Russia's 'alternative Olympics.'

docs.abstract: Betfair US, subsidiary of European bookmaker Paddy Power Betfair, plans to use style of betting known as exchange wagering to attract young, tech-savvy gamblers as legislators push to legalize online sports gambling in United States.

docs.lead_paragraph: A former president of Guatemala's soccer federation pleaded guilty on Friday to charges he received bribes to award lucrative media and marketing rights for soccer matches, the latest development in the U.S. corruption investigation into world soccer's governing body FIFA.
